pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: South Carolina Department of Archives & History
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: This series contains correspondence, memoranda, and photographs relating to speeches given by Governor Richards.  Almost all the material in this file deals with the governor's 1929 Chicago radio address on South Carolina resources.
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: All materials in this collection are considered public domain and may be freely used.  We request that any materials used in publication cite the South Carolina Department of Archives and History, collection name, and collection ID as the source.
